title: Enzalutamide
summary: Enzalutamide, sold under the brand name Xtandi, is a nonsteroidal antiandrogen (NSAA) medication which is used in the treatment of prostate cancer.[2][6] It is  indicated for use in conjunction with castration in the treatment of metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer (mCRPC),[2] nonmetastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer,[2] and metastatic castration-sensitive prostate cancer (mCSPC).[7] It is taken by mouth.[2]
